works.description: They say “diamonds are a girl’s best friend” and if the diamond is in an adoring heart shape with the tag of most expensive one to be sold in any auction, it becomes the icing on the cake. A heart-shaped diamond is considered as an inimitable symbol of love. The brilliantly cut diamond is special because they are cut with triangular and kite-shaped facets which leads the light to reflect in an amazing way. The two most expensive heart-shaped diamonds available as single diamonds for sale went on to fetch astronomical prices at prestigious auctions.
